TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void HttpContinueDelegate(int StatusCode, WebHeaderCollection httpHeaders);
.class public auto ansi sealed HttpContinueDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub HttpContinueDelegate(StatusCode As Integer, httpHeaders As WebHeaderCollection)
public delegate void HttpContinueDelegate(int StatusCode, WebHeaderCollection ^ httpHeaders);

span.span: The numeric value of the HTTP status from the server.
The headers returned with the 100-continue response from the server.

summary.span: 클라이언트가 계속 응답을 받을 때 호출자에게 알리는 메서드를 나타냅니다.

span.span: Represents the method that notifies callers when a continue response is received by the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 사용 하 여 HTTP 100 때 호출 될 콜백 메서드를 지정 하려면-서버에서 응답을 받을입니다.Use to specify the callback method to be called when an HTTP 100-continue response is received from the server. 집합 대리자가 호출 될 때마다 첫 번째 프로토콜 형식의 응답 수신 합니다.When set, the delegate is called whenever the first protocol response of type is received. 이것은 버전 1.1의 동작에서 변경 프레임 워크입니다.This is a change from the behavior of the version 1.1 Framework. 이벤트 처리기와 동일한 매개 변수를 선언 해야 합니다는 합니다.Your event handler must declare the same parameters as the . > [!NOTE] > `StatusCode` 항상 합니다.`StatusCode` is always . 클라이언트가 서버에서 수신 되는 데이터의 상태를 표시 하려고 할 때 유용 합니다.This is useful when the client wants to display the status of data being received from the server.
